FuncDef: The display stp vlan command displays the STP status of an interface added to a specified VLAN.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the STP status of an interface added to a specified VLAN.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4094.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After an interface is added to a VLAN, run the display stp vlan command to view the STP status of the interface.
